entry.value: { "reference": [ { "amount_in_reporting_currency": number(.f_debit) + number(.f_credit), "Posting_type": null, "Posting_layer": null, "description": .com_id, "Created_by": "nifi-pipeline" } ], "glcode": .glcode, "opening_amount": 0, "transaction": number(.debit) + number(.credit), "audit_entries": 0, "closing_amount": 0, "stage": 0, "status": true, "date": .date }

entry.value: { "trialbalance": [ for (.response.items) let opening_debit = if (.op_dr) number(.op_dr) else 0 let opening_credit = if (.op_cr) number(.op_cr) else 0 let closing_debit = if (.closing_debit) number(.closing_debit) else 0 let closing_credit = if (.closing_credit) number(.closing_credit) else 0 let transaction_debit = if (.trnx_dr) number(.trnx_dr) else 0 let transaction_credit = if (.trnx_cr) number(.trnx_cr) else 0 let transaction = $transaction_debit - $transaction_credit let raw_endbalance = $closing_debit - $closing_credit let endbalance = round($raw_endbalance * 100) / 100 let raw_startbalance = $opening_debit - $opening_credit let startbalance = round($raw_startbalance * 100) / 100 { "glcode": .acctnumber, "transaction": $transaction, "audit_entries": 0, "closing_amount": $endbalance, "opening_amount": $startbalance, "location": .subsidiary, "currency": "dollar" } ] }
